autosolvate.autosolvate.solventBoxBuilderÔÉÅ

class autosolvate.autosolvate.solventBoxBuilder(xyzfile: str, slu_netcharge=0, slu_spinmult=1, charge_method='resp', slu_count=1, solvent='water', solvent_frcmod='', solvent_off='', solvent_box_name='SLVBOX', slv_generate=False, slv_xyz='', slv_count=1680, cube_size=54, closeness=0.8, folder='/home/sunnyxun/projects/merge/AutoSolvate/docs/', outputFile='', **kwargs)[source]ÔÉÅ

Solvated molecule in specified solvent.

Parameters:

  • solvent (str, Optional, default: ‚Äòwater‚Äô) ‚Äì Currently implemented solvents are: ‚Äòwater‚Äô, ‚Äòmethanol‚Äô, ‚Äòchloroform‚Äô, ‚Äònma‚Äô, ‚Äòacetonitrile‚Äô

  • slu_netcharge (int, Optional, default 0) ‚Äì Charge of solute, the solvent box will be neutralized with Cl- and Na+ ions

  • cube_size (float, Optional, default: 54) ‚Äì Size of MM solvent box

  • charge_method (str, Optional, default: ‚Äúresp‚Äù) ‚Äì Use ‚Äòresp‚Äô (quantum mechanical calculation needed) or ‚Äòbcc‚Äô to estimate partial charges

  • slu_spinmult (int, Optional, default: 1) ‚Äì Spinmultiplicity of solute

  • outputFile (str, Optional, default=‚Äôwater_solvated‚Äô) ‚Äì Filename-prefix for outputfiles

  • srun_use (bool, Optional, default=‚ÄôFalse) ‚Äì Run all commands with a srun prefix

Returns:

To run solvation, call build function.

Return type:

None
